contractObjectiveList.description: Destroy the target, clear area of additional enemy forces, and reach the evac zone with all surviving 'Mechs.
contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy the Target and Escape

dialogueContent.words: These are the coordinates that {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} provided.
Move up, let's see what sort of mech has causing so much fuss.
Once it's down you can extract at your leisure.
Well done, Commander. That was a big one.
This is a disaster. Commander, I'm pulling the plug on this operation.
Eliminate any remaining hostiles or head for the pickup point.
That's one lance completely neutralized, Commander.
That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!
Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our initial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.
Commander, we've got a dropship on scope, the target is attempting to extract.

longDescription: It sounds like we should send in our best on this one, Commander.

objectiveList.description: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance
objectiveList.title: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective

objectiveList.description: Armor of the Target is breached.
objectiveList.title: Armor Breached

shortDescription: We've had difficulty pinning down a particularly powerful {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} 'mech. It has destroyed or eluded our forces multiple times. We have a lead on it's current location. Investigate, and if it's there, kill it.
